  physical_appearance: The image shows the front cover of a booklet. It has a green and white background and is rectangular in shape. There is a line of four Chinese characters in bold at the centre. There is a drawing of a line o buildings on the booklet near the bottom. Below it are two lines of Chinese characters.

  subject_terms_1: unions (political entities) politics government policy governments (administrative bodies)

  subject_terms_2: Government policy Pamphlets Singapore Government Institutes Political science Malaya

  subject_terms_3: Politics and Government

  sgcool_label_text: This booklet was published by the Ministry of Culture to communicate the new government’s messages and larger concerns regarding the state of the nation. The importance of Merger between Singapore and Malaya is discussed here
 with the year leading up to it an important one for a decision to be taken by Singapore. This booklet was the sixth of the Towards Socialism series by the Ministry of Culture.

The importance of Merger between Singapore and Malaya is discussed here, with the year leading up to it an important one for a decision to be taken by Singapore. This booklet was the sixth of the Towards Socialism series by the Ministry of Culture.
